response.overview: Experience remarkable stories from the unprecedented scientific mission to comprehensively study the environmental impacts of the Deepwater Horizon oil spill and find new ways to ease the devastation. Dispatches From The Gulf 2 follow-up to the EmmyÂ® Award-winning film Dispatches from the Gulf. Narrated by Matt Damon.
response.title: Dispatches from the Gulf 2

release_dates.note: Environmental Film Festival in the Nation's Capital
